title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2054.11 - Miscellaneous
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2054.11 - Miscellaneous

State Regulations
(a) No provision of
these guidelines shall be the basis for any claim based on these guidelines
against the corporation or any of its directors, officers, or
employees. (b) These guidelines
shall not alter the rights and obligations of any contract of the corporation
with a third party executed before adoption of these guidelines, nor shall
these guidelines be deemed to alter the terms of any contract or affect the
validity of any contract made in violation of or without compliance with these
guidelines. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
2054.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
